articles.content:
Whitehall sources, however, pointed out that the UK guaranteed millions of pounds to the Halix factory in April last year  before the Oxford vaccine had been proven effective.

articles.description: Dutch factory equipped to produce Oxford jab after major investment from UK last April, but Brussels insists doses must stay in Europe
articles.title: British taxpayers funded EU factory at heart of vaccine row - Telegraph.co.uk

articles.content: US and European scientists have called off a controversial balloon test flight that was to take place in Sweden’s far north in June, part of a disputed solar geoengineering experiment to artificially… [+1776 chars]
articles.description: US and European scientists have called off a controversial balloon test flight that was to take place in Sweden's far north in June, part of a disputed solar geoengineering experiment to artificially cool the planet.
articles.title: Controversial test flight aimed at cooling the planet cancelled - Manila Bulletin
